issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Discovered while verifying EUCA-9470, steps to reproduce are the same as there.

After instance restore there are ERRORs logged for each instance and a debug level message about a failure for each restore, however, each instance is restored successfully. The instances are hvm, the failure is that there is no Kernel or Ramdisk which does not apply to hvm images. I don't know if this is the root cause of the resulting index out of range error.

e-d-i after restore
{code}
[root@d-32 ~]# euca-describe-instances
RESERVATION	r-1136F763	590617792982	default
INSTANCE	i-897C01D2	emi-803E29A8	10.111.102.56	172.31.162.138	running	adminkey	0		m1.small	2014-07-11T17:21:52.174Z	PARTI00				monitoring-disabled	10.111.102.56	172.31.162.138			instance-store					hvm			sg-0A783E80
TAG	instance	i-897C01D2	euca:node	10.111.1.135
INSTANCE	i-5EA8EA21	emi-803E29A8	10.111.102.62	172.31.162.140	running	adminkey	2		m1.small	2014-07-11T17:21:52.350Z	PARTI00				monitoring-disabled	10.111.102.62	172.31.162.140			instance-store					hvm			sg-0A783E80
TAG	instance	i-5EA8EA21	euca:node	10.111.1.135
INSTANCE	i-584CEB16	emi-803E29A8	10.111.102.57	172.31.162.141	running	adminkey	1		m1.small	2014-07-11T17:21:52.501Z	PARTI00				monitoring-disabled	10.111.102.57	172.31.162.141			instance-store					hvm			sg-0A783E80
TAG	instance	i-584CEB16	euca:node	10.111.1.135
{code}

The ERROR that is logged
{code}
2014-07-11 10:21:52 ERROR 000070429 Emis                     | com.eucalyptus.context.IllegalContextAccessException: Cannot access context implicitly using lookup(V) outside of a service.
2014-07-11 10:21:52 ERROR 000070429 Emis                     | com.eucalyptus.context.IllegalContextAccessException: Cannot access context implicitly using lookup(V) outside of a service.
2014-07-11 10:21:52 ERROR 000070429 Emis                     | com.eucalyptus.context.IllegalContextAccessException: Cannot access context implicitly using lookup(V) outside of a service.
{code}

The failure that is logged
{code}
2014-07-11 10:21:52 DEBUG 000070429 VmInstance               | No kernelId  for: i-897C01D2 because vbr does not contain a kernel: [[type:ephemeral, class:class edu.ucsb.eucalyptus.cloud.VirtualBootRecord, blockStorage:false, guestDeviceName:sdb, resourceLocation:none, id:none, size:125829120, format:ext3], [type:machine, class:class edu.ucsb.eucalyptus.cloud.VirtualBootRecord, blockStorage:false, guestDeviceName:sda, resourceLocation:http://imaging@10.111.1.102:8773/services/objectstorage/867924-download-manifests/DM-r-1136F763?Expires=1405109124&AWSAccessKeyId=AKIZDNUORMJSC6EFF1IE&Signature=qgOsleAnJ%2BDjM1bTeDiynEcG1zo%3D, id:emi-803E29A8, size:5242880000, format:none]]
2014-07-11 10:21:52 DEBUG 000070429 VmInstance               | No ramdiskId  for: i-897C01D2 because vbr does not contain a ramdisk: [[type:ephemeral, class:class edu.ucsb.eucalyptus.cloud.VirtualBootRecord, blockStorage:false, guestDeviceName:sdb, resourceLocation:none, id:none, size:125829120, format:ext3], [type:machine, class:class edu.ucsb.eucalyptus.cloud.VirtualBootRecord, blockStorage:false, guestDeviceName:sda, resourceLocation:http://imaging@10.111.1.102:8773/services/objectstorage/867924-download-manifests/DM-r-1136F763?Expires=1405109124&AWSAccessKeyId=AKIZDNUORMJSC6EFF1IE&Signature=qgOsleAnJ%2BDjM1bTeDiynEcG1zo%3D, id:emi-803E29A8, size:5242880000, format:none]]
2014-07-11 10:21:52 DEBUG 000070429 VmInstance               | Failed to restore user data for : i-897C01D2 because of: unable to decode base64 string: String index out of range: -4
2014-07-11 10:21:52 DEBUG 000070429 VmInstance               | Running cleanup for instance i-897C01D2
2014-07-11 10:21:52 DEBUG 000070429 VmInstance               | No kernelId  for: i-5EA8EA21 because vbr does not contain a kernel: [[type:ephemeral, class:class edu.ucsb.eucalyptus.cloud.VirtualBootRecord, blockStorage:false, guestDeviceName:sdb, resourceLocation:none, id:none, size:125829120, format:ext3], [type:machine, class:class edu.ucsb.eucalyptus.cloud.VirtualBootRecord, blockStorage:false, guestDeviceName:sda, resourceLocation:http://imaging@10.111.1.102:8773/services/objectstorage/867924-download-manifests/DM-r-1136F763?Expires=1405109129&AWSAccessKeyId=AKIZDNUORMJSC6EFF1IE&Signature=Y50LT%2FEc8IdhCSTUDVjeBPPwcFg%3D, id:emi-803E29A8, size:5242880000, format:none]]

fields.summary: Instance restore logs ERRORs and failures yet restore succeeds

comments.body: The error is no longer logged and the debug log for "Failed to restore user data ..." is also fixed.
Did not see errors on multiple instance restore.
